Package com.vuzix.ultralite

Interface LVGLImage.ColorMapper

  • Enclosing class:
    LVGLImage
    public static interface LVGLImage.ColorMapper
    Maps RGB colors to 1 or 2 bit colors.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static android.graphics.Color BLACK
      The darkest color supported on the glasses, results in a transparent pixel.
      static android.graphics.Color DIM
      Displays a dimly lit pixel on the glasses.
      static android.graphics.Color MID
      Displays a mid-level lit pixel on the glasses.
      static android.graphics.Color WHITE
      The brightest color supported on the glasses, results in a fully lit pixel.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      android.graphics.Color[] getColors()
      Provides the color pallet this mapper uses.
      int mapColor​(android.graphics.Color color)
      Maps a Color to an index in the pallet.

    • Field Detail

      • BLACK

        static final android.graphics.Color BLACK
        The darkest color supported on the glasses, results in a transparent pixel.

      • DIM

        static final android.graphics.Color DIM
        Displays a dimly lit pixel on the glasses.

      • MID

        static final android.graphics.Color MID
        Displays a mid-level lit pixel on the glasses.

      • WHITE

        static final android.graphics.Color WHITE
        The brightest color supported on the glasses, results in a fully lit pixel.

    • Method Detail

      • getColors

        android.graphics.Color[] getColors()
        Provides the color pallet this mapper uses. You must return the appropriate number of colors based on the color format you want to use.
        Returns:
        an array of Colors

      • mapColor

        int mapColor​(android.graphics.Color color)
        Maps a Color to an index in the pallet. You must return an index that is in the range of pallet indices.
        Parameters:
        color - a Color
        Returns:
        the indexed value of the desired Color in the pallet.
